name: Potion Punk Park Panic
description:
Hello everyone!

Potion Punk Park Panic is a short arcade game where you defend yourself with potions from the evil entities which want to stop you! Why do construction workers, businessmen, and helicopters what to stop this punk? 

--------------

This is my first game. I created this as part of the Unity Learn Junior Programmer pathway. This was the Lab project worked on during the course.

Since it was my own design and idea, I decided to add features, polish, and complete this to be my first released game. I wanted to complete the full process from concept to release! I hope you enjoy, if you decide to try my little game. Let me know what you think!
